metadata.title: Inhibition of betanodavirus infection by inhibitors of endosomal acidification

abstract.original_text: ence of 1 mM NH 4 Cl or 1 mM chloroquine in the medium inhibited the entry of betanodaviruses into cells and inhibited viral infection. The lysosomotropic agents bafilomycin A1 and monensin also inhibited virus-induced cytopathology and virus production. Our data demonstrate that inhibitors of endosomal acidification are candidates as antiviral agents against betanodavirus.
